input.sentences: after graduation she took many pictures .
she took pictures with her family .
she took pictures with people she knew from school .
it was an exciting day for everyone involved .
output.sentences: I bet there are more pictures taken on graduation days than any other days besides weddings.
It's because when someone is graduating, everyone is so excited.
It's almost expected that you take a ton of pictures with your classmates, professors, and family.
You will want to fondly remember your school days and pictures with people you spent them with will help you with that.
Other than that, there's not much else involved on such an exciting day.
